name: Maniac Mansion
description: Select a file with the extension lfl,  the script will copy the all lfl files from the original folder into Lutris

files.game: N/A:Select a file with the extension *.lfl

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select a file with the extension *.lfl
game:
  game_id: maniac
  path: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- write_file:
    content: '#!/bin/bash

      src=$1

      dst=$2

      src_path=$(echo "$1" | sed -r "s/(.+)\/.+/\1/")

      cp -avr "$src_path/."  "$dst"'
    file: $CACHE/bulkcopy.sh
- chmodx: $CACHE/bulkcopy.sh
- execute:
    args: $game $GAMEDIR
    file: $CACHE/bulkcopy.sh
